article: Most teenagers in the United States spend their time trying to make time for school, family and friends. But some choose bigger goals and make a difference in the world. He died 10 months later. "When he was first diagnosed I immediately knew I had to do something to help him. That's  _  I formed Team Winter for prostate cancer research and  _  ."
